snippet.title: Absinthia Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
From the creator of Knight Bewitched and Celestial Hearts comes the next chapter in the Knights of Ambrose saga.

Lilith, demoness of legend, has brought her wrath to the peaceful village Katti Town, seeking easy means to harness energy for her grand plans.  Only Freya, a mysterious wandering warrior, has shown the power to hold Lilith at bay.  As Freya takes Sera the swordswoman, Jake the rogue and Thomas the mage under her guidance, the attacks on Katti grow more frequent.  Lilith must be stopped...but who is Freya, anyway?

Absinthia explores self-acceptance, found family and trauma and four friends struggle to find themselves amidst a journey they never imagined.  Truly a tale of broken hearts and mending souls.

Features:

--Traditional turn-based jRPG battle system
--Difficulty options for those who seek challenge–or only want to focus on the story
--Just the right length: Absinthia‘s playtime clocks at around 8-12 hours
--An all-queer main character cast
--SNES-style pixel art and illustrations
--Original soundtrack: Composed by Jazz Stewart of PNK SHBA, Absinthia‘s soundtrack is a modern take on some of the greatest tunes from the SNES era of jRPGs
--Cover and cutscene art by Rae Stilwell

Wishlist Absinthia on Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1848070/Absinthia/

Follow the Absinthia Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jkweath/absinthia

Find more info on Team Bewitched's other projects at http://teambewitched.com/

Check out the Team Bewtiched Redbubble merch store!
https://www.redbubble.com/people/TeamBewitched/shop?asc=u&ref=account-nav-dropdown

Follow the members of Team Bewitched on Twitter!

Creator and Director Joshua Keith 
https://twitter.com/Jkweath

Music Composer Jazz Stewart 
https://twitter.com/JazzStewart3

Illustrator Rae Stilwell 
https://twitter.com/RaeStilwell

Co-writer and Creative Consultant Lilliana "Ginal" Young https://twitter.com/CelahGinal

This trailer was recorded and edited by Lilliana "Ginal" Young.
